item.title: About Me
item.description: ‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎ Who am i? -CyberSec Enthusiast, Coder/H4CK3R & definitely not hooman‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎ ‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎ What i do? -i play CTF & Hackathon's and i sip coffee (like alot)‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎ ‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎Academics? -CS Major at Memorial University of Newfoundland ‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎ ‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎ Currently working on -How to Spend my Life Better‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎ ‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎ Life update -No Update, still working on my new version‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎‎ Let's be serious. Yo! Everyone. This is Muhammed Patel AKA P41N Studying Computer Science with a prime crush on Cyber-security.
Working on my Projects yet!!! Link to heading

item.title: Courses
item.description: List of courses i have done so faaaar… Link to heading Computer 1001 💻 Link to heading This course is all about Python Programming. You will learn basics of python, from the very scratch to Object Oriented Programming (OOP) and a bit of Recursive Functions (which i am still trying to understand 💀) but…honesty in classes and assignments, You’re ‘A’ 🤓 Link to heading Computer 1002 ❌ Link to heading This might be the worst course in the whole degree!
